title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 56-12.3 - Applicable variances (avs)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 56-12.3 - Applicable variances (avs)

State Regulations

Notice of issuance of applicable variances under this

Part, article 30 of the Labor Law or other applicable sections of State law, shall be published in the State Register and indexed by subject matter and
number. Single copies of such variances may be obtained from the local district
office of the Asbestos Control Bureau. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
56-12.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
